snippet: Lionel Messi scored twice, helping Barcelona make the best start in Spanish league history with a 5-1 home win over Athletic Bilbao, and Real Madrid extended its dominance over its neighbor Atlético Madrid with a 2-0 victory.
abstract: Barcelona forward Lionel Messi scores twice, helping his team make the best start in Spanish soccer league history with a 5-1 home win over Athletic Bilbao.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi scored twice, helping Barcelona make the best start in Spanish league history with a 5-1 home win over Athletic Bilbao, and Real Madrid extended its dominance over its neighbor Atlético Madrid with a 2-0 victory.

headline.seo: Lionel Messi a Goal Short of Record
headline.main: Messi a Goal Short of a Record
headline.print_headline: Messi a Goal Short of a Record
